languages.text: {n}Капеллан невозмутимо взирает на побоище.{/n} "Денз бы одобрил такие похороны. Что теперь? Что делать с Фиделио?"
{n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of a funeral like this. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан невозмутимо взирает на побоище.{/n} "Денз бы одобрил такие похороны. Что теперь? Что делать с Фиделио?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of such a funeral. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"
{n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of such a funeral. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"
{n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of a funeral like this. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"
{n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of a funeral like this. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"
{n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of a funeral like this. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"

languages.text: {n}牧师观察着这场屠杀，不为所动。{/n}“丹兹会喜欢这样的葬礼的。现在怎么办？我们要怎么处理菲迪奥？”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of a funeral like this. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师观察着这场屠杀，不为所动。{/n}“丹兹会喜欢这样的葬礼的。现在怎么办？我们要怎么处理菲迪奥？”

languages.text: {n}El capellán observa impasible la masacre.{/n} «A Denz le habría gustado saber que su funeral iba a ser así. ¿Y ahora qué? ¿Qué hacemos con Fidelio?».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of a funeral like this. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El capellán observa impasible la masacre.{/n} «A Denz le habría gustado saber que su funeral iba a ser así. ¿Y ahora qué? ¿Qué hacemos con Fidelio?».

languages.text: {n}教戒官は動じることなく、殺戮の様子を観察している。{/n}「デンツならこのような葬式を喜ぶでしょう。さて、どうします？フィデリオはいかがなさるのです？」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of a funeral like this. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官は動じることなく、殺戮の様子を観察している。{/n}「デンツならこのような葬式を喜ぶでしょう。さて、どうします？フィデリオはいかがなさるのです？」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester beobachtet ungerührt das Gemetzel.{/n} "Denz würde diese Bestattung gefallen. Und jetzt? Was machen wir mit Fidelio?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of a funeral like this. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester beobachtet ungerührt das Gemetzel.{/n} "Denz würde diese Bestattung gefallen. Und jetzt? Was machen wir mit Fidelio?"

languages.text: {n}Chapelain observe le carnage d'un air indifférent.{/n} « Voilà des funérailles dignes de Denz. Et maintenant ? Qu'allons-nous faire de Fidélio ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of a funeral like this. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain observe le carnage d'un air indifférent.{/n} « Voilà des funérailles dignes de Denz. Et maintenant ? Qu'allons-nous faire de Fidélio ? »

languages.text: {n}Papaz, katliamı umursamazca inceliyor.{/n} "Bu cenaze töreni, Denz'in hoşuna giderdi. Şimdi ne olacak? Fidelio'yu ne yapacağız?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain is observing the carnage, unfazed.{/n} "Denz would approve of a funeral like this. Now what? What are we going to do with Fidelio?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz, katliamı umursamazca inceliyor.{/n} "Bu cenaze töreni Denz'in hoşuna giderdi. Şimdi ne olacak? Fidelio'yu ne yapacağız?"
